short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab plugin counting you down to the weekend

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is the weekend the best part of your week? 

Are you always counting down until you finally can do what you want to do?

Then count no longer. Install this Chrome plugin and every new tab will tell you exactly how long you need to wait before it is the weekend. It will count you down till Friday 5pm, the official start of the weekend!
